actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means..

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that certain homeowners mortgage interest paid by the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development on behalf of a low-income mortgagor shall not be deductible by such a mortgagor.

summary.text: Provides that homeowner mortgage interest paid by the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development on behalf of a low-income mortgagor shall not be tax deductible under the Internal Revenue Code by such a mortgagor. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 280)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that certain homeowners mortgage interest paid by the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development on behalf of a low-income mortgagor shall not be deductible by such a mortgagor.
